title: Disconnections After Champion Select
body:
It appears to be a trend with me at the very least...
After a major patch, the game has this horrendous tendency to disconnect after the teams have selected their champion. It was the case when Kindred came out, and now since the Pre-season 2016 Patch came out. And when I do FINALLY manage to connect, the game has already went south. I had to surrender two games because of this.

This is putting me on so much tilt it's practically ninety degrees.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Is there a solution to this cancer of a problem?

replies.body:
Hey Geno the Creeper, 

You may want to check out RIots connection KB and that should fix you right up. Sorry about your games by the way, that's no fun. If this doesn't fix your issue reach out to me! 

Riot Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
